name: Nox Terrorem: Lost Souls
descr:
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1566150/extras/Capture32yu24u.PNG?t=1622498488[/img]
Immerse yourself in Nox Terrorem: Lost Souls. Play as Greg, searching for your missing friend and uncovering the truth behind a chilling mystery.

Shortly after requesting your help, your friend Alex vanishes. You enter the woods of Marrowbrooke, WA to try and find him. However, you are not alone in this place...

Nox Terrorem: Lost Souls is an atmospheric survival horror game which features:
[list][li]5+ hours of gameplay[/li][li]A chilling story told through various documents[/li][li]A horrifying Enemy who is relentless in its chase[/li][li]5 unique locations to explore[/li][li]Haunting soundtrack written by composer Jake Menear[/li][li]Cinematic effects and realistic visuals[/li][/list]
Do you dare enter the forest?
